Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1976...
Injured on 6/21/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 9/2/1981...
Had first career hit on 8/20/1984, off Gil Chavez (SHP)...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/4/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/23/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $2,800,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
